column4: I am useing "Ubuntu ultamite editon" and I can't mount data cds/movie dvds or even detect my usb flash drive. I can read and play Audio cds. help?
Ubuntu Ultimtae Edition isn't supported here.  They ... change a lot of things that can break some stuff, etc.  We recommend you install real Ubuntu, and go with that.
8.10 is only supported until April of 2010.  You'll want to use 8.04 to be supported until 2011
What did you mess up on?
